snippet: Supporters of relaxed rules for licensed owners surfaced after a previous column about travelers trying to take guns on planes.
abstract: Joe Sharkey On the Road column observes some supporters of relaxed rules for licensed gun owners contend security at airports would improve if permit-holders were allowed to carry firearms on planes; points out statistics show more people are carrying guns to airports as gun sales boom.
lead_paragraph: Supporters of relaxed rules for licensed owners surfaced after a previous column about travelers trying to take guns on planes.

headline.print_headline: Owners Argue Merits Of Firearms on Airplanes
headline.seo: Owners Argue Merits of Firearms on Airplanes - On the Road
headline.main: Owners Argue Merits of Firearms on Airplanes
